mapper.sql: DELIVERY_ID, INV_ORG_ID, ORDER_HEADER_ID, DELIVERY_NUMBER, DELIVERY_TYPE, DELIVERY_STATUS, DELIVERY_DATE, REMARK, OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER, REQUEST_ID, PROGRAM_ID, CREATION_DATE, CREATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE, LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN, ATTRIBUTE_CATEGORY, ATTRIBUTE1, ATTRIBUTE2, ATTRIBUTE3, ATTRIBUTE4, ATTRIBUTE5, ATTRIBUTE6, ATTRIBUTE7, ATTRIBUTE8, ATTRIBUTE9, ATTRIBUTE10, ATTRIBUTE11, ATTRIBUTE12, ATTRIBUTE13, ATTRIBUTE14, ATTRIBUTE15, PICK_RELEASE_ID, contact_name, phone ,city_code ,state_code ,country_code ,address ,address1 ,address2 ,address3 ,area_code ,zip_code,RECEIPT_FLAG,INTERNAL_REMARK
mapper.select:
SELECT dod.delivery_id ,dod.inv_org_id ,dod.order_header_id ,dod.delivery_number ,dod.delivery_type ,dod.delivery_status ,dod.delivery_date ,dod.remark ,dod.object_version_number ,dod.request_id ,dod.program_id ,dod.creation_date ,dod.created_by ,dod.last_updated_by ,dod.last_update_date ,dod.last_update_login ,dod.attribute_category ,dod.attribute1 ,dod.attribute2 ,dod.attribute3 ,dod.attribute4 ,dod.attribute5 ,dod.attribute6 ,dod.attribute7 ,dod.attribute8 ,dod.attribute9 ,dod.attribute10 ,dod.attribute11 ,dod.attribute12 ,dod.attribute13 ,dod.attribute14 ,dod.attribute15 ,dod.pick_release_id ,dod.contact_name ,dod.phone ,dod.city_code ,dod.state_code ,dod.country_code ,dod.address ,dod.address1 ,dod.address2 ,dod.address3 ,dod.area_code ,dod.zip_code ,dod.internal_remark ,(select orgtl.NAME from SPM_INV_ORGANIZATION_TL orgtl WHERE ORGTL.INV_ORG_ID = dod.inv_org_id AND ORGTL.LANG = #{localel,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )inv_org_name ,sou.name ou_name ,oso.order_number ,mm.member_id member_identify ,mm.member_name ,mm.member_code ,dod.receipt_flag ,dod.logistics_company ,dod.tracker_number , (select code FROM spm_market_b where market_id = (SELECT so.market_id FROM SPM_SALES_ORGANIZATION_B so where so.sales_org_id = oso.sales_org_id) ) marketCode ,oso.remark order_remark ,oso.internal_remark order_internal_remark
FROM dm_order_delivery dod LEFT JOIN SPM_INV_ORGANIZATION_B sio ON sio.inv_org_id = dod.inv_org_id LEFT JOIN SPM_OPERATING_UNIT_B sou ON sou.operating_unit_id = sio.operation_unit_id LEFT JOIN om_sales_order oso ON oso.header_id = dod.order_header_id LEFT JOIN mm_member_v mm ON oso.member_id = mm.member_id WHERE dod.delivery_id = #{deliveryId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.insert:
select UNIX_TIMESTAMP()*1000+floor(rand()*1000) from dual
insert into DM_ORDER_DELIVERY (DELIVERY_ID, INV_ORG_ID, ORDER_HEADER_ID, DELIVERY_NUMBER, DELIVERY_TYPE, DELIVERY_STATUS, DELIVERY_DATE, REMARK ,CONTACT_NAME,PHONE ,CITY_CODE ,STATE_CODE ,COUNTRY_CODE ,ADDRESS,ADDRESS1,ADDRESS2,ADDRESS3 ,AREA_CODE,ZIP_CODE ,REQUEST_ID, PROGRAM_ID, CREATION_DATE, CREATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE, LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN, ATTRIBUTE_CATEGORY, ATTRIBUTE1, ATTRIBUTE2, ATTRIBUTE3, ATTRIBUTE4, ATTRIBUTE5, ATTRIBUTE6, ATTRIBUTE7, ATTRIBUTE8, ATTRIBUTE9, ATTRIBUTE10, ATTRIBUTE11, ATTRIBUTE12, ATTRIBUTE13, ATTRIBUTE14, ATTRIBUTE15, PICK_RELEASE_ID,RECEIPT_FLAG,INTERNAL_REMARK ) values (#{deliveryId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{invOrgId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{orderHeaderId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{deliveryNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deliveryType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deliveryStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deliveryDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stateCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{countryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zipCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requestId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{programId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{createdBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{lastUpdateLogin,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{attributeCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute8,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute9,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute10,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute11,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute12,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute13,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute14,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute15,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pickReleaseId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, 'N',#{internalRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update DM_ORDER_DELIVERY
INV_ORG_ID = #{invOrgId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ORDER_HEADER_ID = #{orderHeaderId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DELIVERY_NUMBER = #{deliveryNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELIVERY_TYPE = #{deliveryType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELIVERY_STATUS = #{deliveryStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELIVERY_DATE = #{deliveryDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contact_name = #{contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city_code = #{cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
state_code = #{stateCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
country_code = #{countryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address1 = #{address1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address2 = #{address2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address3 = #{address3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
area_code = #{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
zip_code = #{zipCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER = OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER+1,
REQUEST_ID = #{requestId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PROGRAM_ID = #{programId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAST_UPDATED_BY = #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAST_UPDATE_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN = #{lastUpdateLogin,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ATTRIBUTE_CATEGORY = #{attributeCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE1 = #{attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE2 = #{attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE3 = #{attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE4 = #{attribute4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE5 = #{attribute5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE6 = #{attribute6,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE7 = #{attribute7,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE8 = #{attribute8,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE9 = #{attribute9,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE10 = #{attribute10,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE11 = #{attribute11,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE12 = #{attribute12,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE13 = #{attribute13,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE14 = #{attribute14,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE15 = #{attribute15,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PICK_RELEASE_ID = #{pickReleaseId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RECEIPT_FLAG = #{receiptFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOGISTICS_COMPANY = #{logisticsCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRACKER_NUMBER = #{trackerNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INTERNAL_REMARK = #{internalRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where DELIVERY_ID = #{deliveryId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update DM_ORDER_DELIVERY set INV_ORG_ID = #{invOrgId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ORDER_HEADER_ID = #{orderHeaderId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DELIVERY_NUMBER = #{deliveryNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DELIVERY_TYPE = #{deliveryType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DELIVERY_STATUS = #{deliveryStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DELIVERY_DATE = #{deliveryDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER = OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER+1, REQUEST_ID = #{requestId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PROGRAM_ID = #{programId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAST_UPDATED_BY = #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAST_UPDATE_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN = #{lastUpdateLogin,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ATTRIBUTE_CATEGORY = #{attributeCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE1 = #{attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE2 = #{attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE3 = #{attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE4 = #{attribute4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE5 = #{attribute5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE6 = #{attribute6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE7 = #{attribute7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE8 = #{attribute8,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE9 = #{attribute9,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE10 = #{attribute10,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE11 = #{attribute11,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE12 = #{attribute12,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE13 = #{attribute13,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE14 = #{attribute14,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE15 = #{attribute15,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PICK_RELEASE_ID = #{pickReleaseId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RECEIPT_FLAG = #{receiptFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INTERNAL_REMARK = #{internalRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where DELIVERY_ID = #{deliveryId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

select
from dm_order_delivery where DELIVERY_ID = #{deliveryId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} for update
